sn27.3:4.2: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye consciousness,
sn27.3:4.7: or mind consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
sn27.3:4.8: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
sn27.3:4.9: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
